personal.title: Slow Typer
personal.description: A minimalist typing speed test application built with React and TypeScript. Features real-time feedback, performance metrics, and a clean, distraction-free interface for improving typing skills.
features: Real-time typing feedback with visual indicators
Random text generation from curated collection
Timer with precise tracking from first keystroke

personal.title: Streak - Habit Tracker
personal.description: A GitHub-style contribution tracker for personal habits. Build consistency one commit at a time with visual progress tracking and streak building.
features: Single habit focus to prevent overwhelm
Visual progress tracking with green squares

school.title: Clue-Less Game
school.description: A simplified multiplayer version of the classic board game Clue, implemented as a web-based application with real-time gameplay and interactive features.
features: Multiplayer lobby system with real-time updates
Interactive game board with rooms and secret passages
Turn-based gameplay with move, suggest, and accuse actions
